str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
In a disorderly manner, irregularly. Adverb from ataktos, irregularly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To overdo, be a busybody, waste my labor about (a thing). From peri and ergazomai; to work all around, i.e. Bustle about.
